attributes.action: Add sign language to the primary school national curriculum
attributes.additional_details: Because there are more and more children in schools of whom have hearing or speaking difficulties and are unable to communicate with their peers.
attributes.background: Add sig language to the curriculum so that children who are deaf (for example) can community with their peers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620767
